sentences.v: 吉姆18岁。
sentences.tran: Jim was eighteen (= 18 years old ).

ws.tran: 第十八的，第十八个的；十八分之一的

trans.en: the number 19

sentences.v: 当时是7点19分。
sentences.tran: It was nineteen minutes past seven.

sentences.v: 我当时只有19岁。
sentences.tran: I was only nineteen (= 19 years old ).

trans.en: the number 20

sentences.v: 距内罗毕20英里的一个小村庄
sentences.tran: a small village twenty miles from Nairobi

sentences.v: 我快20岁了。
sentences.tran: I’m nearly twenty (= 20 years old ) .

ws.tran: 第二十的；二十分之一的
二十几岁；二十年代（1920年到1929年的时期）；一生中20至29岁的十年

trans.en: a light frame covered in coloured paper or plastic that you let fly in the air on the end of one or two long strings

sentences.v: 她有一只蓝色和绿色的风筝。
sentences.tran: She has a blue and green kite.

sentences.v: 小孩儿给自己的风筝装了尾巴。
sentences.tran: The child tailed his kite.

sentences.v: 他试图放飞他的风筝。
sentences.tran: He tried to fly his kite.

phrases.v: v. 放风筝；开空头支票；试探舆论
放风筝；开空头支票；签发通融票据以资弥补
喝醉酒的；被毒品麻醉的；如醉如痴的
追风筝的人（电影名，根据同名小说改编）

trans.en: someone or something that is beautiful is extremely attractive to look at

sentences.v: 她比我记忆中更美。
sentences.tran: She was even more beautiful than I had remembered.

sentences.v: 一束美丽的花
sentences.tran: a beautiful bunch of flowers

ws.tran: 美；美丽；美人；美好的东西
